1<?php
2/**
3 * @file classes/submissionFile/Repository.php
4 *
5 * Copyright (c) 2014-2021 Simon Fraser University
6 * Copyright (c) 2000-2021 John Willinsky
7 * Distributed under the GNU GPL v3. For full terms see the file docs/COPYING.
8 *
9 * @class Repository
10 *
11 * @brief A repository to find and manage submission files.
12 */
13
14namespace PKP\submissionFile;
15
16use APP\core\Application;
17use APP\core\Request;
18use APP\facades\Repo;
19use APP\notification\NotificationManager;
20use APP\publication\Publication;
21use Exception;
22use Illuminate\Support\Collection;
23use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;
24use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Mail;
25use PKP\config\Config;
26use PKP\core\Core;
27use PKP\core\PKPApplication;
28use PKP\db\DAORegistry;
29use PKP\file\FileManager;
30use PKP\log\event\SubmissionFileEventLogEntry;
31use PKP\log\SubmissionEmailLogEventType;
32use PKP\mail\mailables\RevisedVersionNotify;
33use PKP\note\Note;
34use PKP\notification\Notification;
35use PKP\plugins\Hook;
36use PKP\query\QueryDAO;
37use PKP\security\authorization\SubmissionFileAccessPolicy;
38use PKP\security\Role;
39use PKP\security\Validation;
40use PKP\services\PKPSchemaService;
41use PKP\stageAssignment\StageAssignment;
42use PKP\submission\reviewRound\ReviewRoundDAO;
43use PKP\submissionFile\exceptions\UnableToCreateFileContentException;
44use PKP\submissionFile\maps\Schema;
45use PKP\validation\ValidatorFactory;
46
47abstract class Repository
48{
49    public DAO $dao;
50    public string $schemaMap = Schema::class;
51    protected Request $request;
52    /** @var PKPSchemaService<SubmissionFile> */
53    protected PKPSchemaService $schemaService;
54
55    /** @var array<int> $reviewFileStages The file stages that are part of a review workflow stage */
56    public array $reviewFileStages = [];
57
58    public function __construct(DAO $dao, Request $request, PKPSchemaService $schemaService)
59    {
60        $this->schemaService = $schemaService;
61        $this->dao = $dao;
62        $this->request = $request;
63    }
64
65    /** @copydoc DAO::newDataObject() */
66    public function newDataObject(array $params = []): SubmissionFile
67    {
68        $object = $this->dao->newDataObject();
69        if (!empty($params)) {
70            $object->setAllData($params);
71        }
72
73        return $object;
74    }
75
76    /** @copydoc DAO::get() */
77    public function get(int $id, ?int $submissionId = null): ?SubmissionFile
78    {
79        return $this->dao->get($id, $submissionId);
80    }
81
82    /** @copydoc DAO::exists() */
83    public function exists(int $id, ?int $submissionId = null): bool
84    {
85        return $this->dao->exists($id, $submissionId);
86    }
87
88    /** @copydoc DAO::getCollector() */
89    public function getCollector(): Collector
90    {
91        return app(Collector::class);
92    }
93
94    /**
95     * Get an instance of the map class for mapping
96     * submission Files to their schema
97     */
98    public function getSchemaMap(): Schema
99    {
100        return app('maps')->withExtensions($this->schemaMap);
101    }
102
103    /**
104     * Validate properties for a submission file
105     *
106     * Perform validation checks on data used to add or edit a submission file.
107     *
108     * @param array $props A key/value array with the new data to validate
109     * @param array $allowedLocales The supported submission metadata locales
110     * @param string $submissionLocale The submission's locale
111     *
112     * @return array A key/value array with validation errors. Empty if no errors
113     *
114     * @hook SubmissionFile::validate [[ &$errors, $object, $props, $allowedLocales, $primaryLocale ]]
115     */
116    public function validate(
117        ?SubmissionFile $object,
118        array $props,
119        array $allowedLocales,
120        string $submissionLocale
121    ): array {
122        $validator = ValidatorFactory::make(
123            $props,
124            $this->schemaService->getValidationRules($this->dao->schema, $allowedLocales),
125            []
126        );
127
128        // Check required fields
129        ValidatorFactory::required(
130            $validator,
131            $object,
132            $this->schemaService->getRequiredProps($this->dao->schema),
133            $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema),
134            $allowedLocales,
135            $submissionLocale
136        );
137
138        // Check for input from disallowed locales
139        ValidatorFactory::allowedLocales($validator, $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema), $allowedLocales);
140
141        // Do not allow the uploaderUserId or createdAt properties to be modified
142        if ($object) {
143            $validator->after(function ($validator) use ($props) {
144                if (
145                    !empty($props['uploaderUserId']) &&
146                    !$validator->errors()->get('uploaderUserId')
147                ) {
148                    $validator
149                        ->errors()
150                        ->add(
151                            'uploaderUserId',
152                            __('submission.file.notAllowedUploaderUserId')
153                        );
154                }
155
156                if (
157                    !empty($props['createdAt']) &&
158                    !$validator->errors()->get('createdAt')
159                ) {
160                    $validator
161                        ->errors()
162                        ->add(
163                            'createdAt',
164                            __('api.files.400.notAllowedCreatedAt')
165                        );
166                }
167            });
168        }
169
170        // Make sure that file stage and assocType match
171        if (isset($props['assocType'])) {
172            $validator->after(function ($validator) use ($props) {
173                if (
174                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_REVIEW_ROUND &&
175                    !in_array(
176                        $props['fileStage'],
177                        [SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_FILE, SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION, SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_INTERNAL_REVIEW_FILE, SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_INTERNAL_REVIEW_REVISION]
178                    )
179                ) {
180                    $validator
181                        ->errors()
182                        ->add(
183                            'assocType',
184                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badReviewRoundAssocType')
185                        );
186                }
187
188                if ($props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_REVIEW_ASSIGNMENT && $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_ATTACHMENT) {
189                    $validator
190                        ->errors()
191                        ->add(
192                            'assocType',
193                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badReviewAssignmentAssocType')
194                        );
195                }
196
197                if (
198                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE &&
199                    $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT
200                ) {
201                    $validator
202                        ->errors()
203                        ->add(
204                            'assocType',
205                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badDependentFileAssocType')
206                        );
207                }
208
209                if (
210                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_NOTE &&
211                    $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_NOTE
212                ) {
213                    $validator
214                        ->errors()
215                        ->add(
216                            'assocType',
217                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badNoteAssocType')
218                        );
219                }
220
221                if (
222                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_REPRESENTATION &&
223                    $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_PROOF
224                ) {
225                    $validator
226                        ->errors()
227                        ->add(
228                            'assocType',
229                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badRepresentationAssocType')
230                        );
231                }
232            });
233        }
234
235        $errors = [];
236
237        if ($validator->fails()) {
238            $errors = $this->schemaService->formatValidationErrors($validator->errors());
239        }
240
241        Hook::call(
242            'SubmissionFile::validate',
243            [
244                &$errors,
245                $object,
246                $props,
247                $allowedLocales,
248                $submissionLocale
249            ]
250        );
251
252        return $errors;
253    }
254
255    /** @copydoc DAO::insert() */
256    public function add(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): int
257    {
258        $submissionFile->setData('createdAt', Core::getCurrentDate());
259        $submissionFile->setData('updatedAt', Core::getCurrentDate());
260
261        $submissionFileId = $this->dao->insert($submissionFile);
262
263        $submissionFile = $this->get($submissionFileId);
264
265        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::add', [$submissionFile]);
266
267        $logData = $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile);
268
269        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
270            $logData,
271            [
272                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
273                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
274                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_UPLOAD,
275                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
276                'message' => 'submission.event.fileUploaded',
277                'isTranslated' => false,
278            ]
279        ));
280        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
281
282        $submission = Repo::submission()->get($submissionFile->getData('submissionId'));
283
284        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
285            $logData,
286            [
287                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
288                'assocId' => $submission->getId(),
289                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD,
290                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
291                'message' => 'submission.event.fileRevised',
292                'isTranslated' => false,
293            ]
294        ));
295        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
296
297        // Update status and notifications when revisions have been uploaded
298        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION ||
299            $submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_INTERNAL_REVIEW_REVISION) {
300            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
301            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getById($submissionFile->getData('assocId'));
302            if (!$reviewRound) {
303                throw new Exception('Submission file added to review round that does not exist.');
304            }
305
306            $reviewRoundDao->updateStatus($reviewRound);
307
308            // Update author notifications
309            // Replaces StageAssignmentDAO::getBySubmissionAndRoleIds
310            $authorUserIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submissionFile->getData('submissionId')])
311                ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
312                ->withStageIds([$reviewRound->getStageId()])
313                ->get()
314                ->pluck('userId')
315                ->all();
316
317            $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
318            $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
319                $this->request,
320                [Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS, Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS],
321                $authorUserIds,
322                PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
323                $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
324            );
325
326            // Notify editors if the file is uploaded by an author
327            if (in_array($submissionFile->getData('uploaderUserId'), $authorUserIds)) {
328                if (!$submission) {
329                    throw new Exception('Submission file added to submission that does not exist.');
330                }
331
332                $this->notifyEditorsRevisionsUploaded($submissionFile);
333            }
334        }
335
336        return $submissionFileId;
337    }
338
339    /** @copydoc DAO::update() */
340    public function edit(
341        SubmissionFile $submissionFile,
342        array $params
343    ): void {
344        $newSubmissionFile = clone $submissionFile;
345        $newSubmissionFile->setAllData(array_merge($newSubmissionFile->_data, $params));
346
347        Hook::call(
348            'SubmissionFile::edit',
349            [
350                $newSubmissionFile,
351                $submissionFile,
352                $params
353            ]
354        );
355
356        $newSubmissionFile->setData('updatedAt', Core::getCurrentDate());
357
358        $this->dao->update($newSubmissionFile);
359
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');
361
362        $logData = $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile);
363        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
364            $logData,
365            [
366                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
367                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
368                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
369                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
370                'isTranslated' => false,
371                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
372            ]
373        ));
374        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
375
376        $submission = Repo::submission()->get($submissionFile->getData('submissionId'));
377
378        Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
379            $logData,
380            [
381                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
382                'assocId' => $submission->getId(),
383                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
384                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
385                'isTranslate' => false,
386                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
387            ]
388        ));
389    }
390
391    /**
392     * Copy a submission file to another stage
393     *
394     * @return int ID of the new submission file
395     */
396    public function copy(SubmissionFile $submissionFile, int $toFileStage, ?int $reviewRoundId = null): int
397    {
398        $newSubmissionFile = clone $submissionFile;
399        $newSubmissionFile->setData('fileStage', $toFileStage);
400        $newSubmissionFile->setData('sourceSubmissionFileId', $submissionFile->getId());
401        $newSubmissionFile->setData('assocType', null);
402        $newSubmissionFile->setData('assocId', null);
403
404        if ($reviewRoundId) {
405            $newSubmissionFile->setData('assocType', Application::ASSOC_TYPE_REVIEW_ROUND);
406            $newSubmissionFile->setData('assocId', $reviewRoundId);
407        }
408
409        return Repo::submissionFile()->add($newSubmissionFile);
410    }
411
412    /** @copydoc DAO::delete() */
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
435                // Replaces StageAssignmentDAO::getBySubmissionAndRoleIds
436                $authorUserIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submissionFile->getData('submissionId')])
437                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
438                    ->get()
439                    ->pluck('userId')
440                    ->all();
441
442                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],
448                    $authorUserIds,
449                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
450                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
451                );
452                break;
453
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
455                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
456                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
457                    [
458                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ASSIGN_COPYEDITOR,
459                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_AWAITING_COPYEDITS
460                    ],
461                    null,
462                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
463                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
464                );
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
473            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }
476
477
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
494            $reviewRoundDao->updateStatus($reviewRound);
495        }
496
497        // Log the deletion
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
513
514    /**
515     * Get the file stage ids that a user can access based on their
516     * stage assignments
517     *
518     * This does not return file stages for ROLE_ID_REVIEWER or ROLE_ID_READER.
519     * These roles are not granted stage assignments and this method should not
520     * be used for these roles.
521     *
522     * This method does not define access to review attachments, discussion
523     * files or dependent files. Access to these files are not determined by
524     * stage assignment.
525     *
526     * In some cases it may be necessary to apply additional restrictions. For example,
527     * authors are granted write access to submission files or revisions only when other
528     * conditions are met. This method only considers these an assigned file stage for
529     * authors when read access is requested.
530     *
531     * $stageAssignments it's an array holding the stage assignments of this user.
532     *   Each key is a workflow stage and value is an array of assigned roles
533     * $action it's an integer holding a flag to read or write to file stages. One of SubmissionFileAccessPolicy::SUBMISSION_FILE_ACCESS_
534     *
535     * @return array List of file stages (SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_*)
536     */
537    public function getAssignedFileStages(
538        array $stageAssignments,
539        int $action
540    ): array {
541        $allowedRoles = [
542            Role::ROLE_ID_MANAGER,
543            Role::ROLE_ID_SITE_ADMIN,
544            Role::ROLE_ID_SUB_EDITOR,
545            Role::ROLE_ID_ASSISTANT,
546            Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR
547        ];
548        $notAuthorRoles = array_diff($allowedRoles, [Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR]);
549
550        $allowedFileStages = [];
551
552        if (
553            array_key_exists(WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_SUBMISSION, $stageAssignments) &&
554            !empty(array_intersect($allowedRoles, $stageAssignments[WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_SUBMISSION]))
555        ) {
556            $hasEditorialAssignment = !empty(array_intersect($notAuthorRoles, $stageAssignments[WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_SUBMISSION]));
557            // Authors only have read access
558            if ($action === SubmissionFileAccessPolicy::SUBMISSION_FILE_ACCESS_READ || $hasEditorialAssignment) {
559                $allowedFileStages[] = SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_SUBMISSION;
560            }
561        }
562
563        if (array_key_exists(WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_INTERNAL_REVIEW, $stageAssignments)) {
564            $hasEditorialAssignment = !empty(array_intersect($notAuthorRoles, $stageAssignments[WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_INTERNAL_REVIEW]));
565            // Authors can only write revision files under specific conditions
566            if ($action === SubmissionFileAccessPolicy::SUBMISSION_FILE_ACCESS_READ || $hasEditorialAssignment) {
567                $allowedFileStages[] = SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_INTERNAL_REVIEW_REVISION;
568            }
569            // Authors can never access review files
570            if ($hasEditorialAssignment) {
571                $allowedFileStages[] = SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_INTERNAL_REVIEW_FILE;
572            }
573        }
574
575        if (array_key_exists(WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_EXTERNAL_REVIEW, $stageAssignments)) {
576            $hasEditorialAssignment = !empty(array_intersect($notAuthorRoles, $stageAssignments[WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_EXTERNAL_REVIEW]));
577            // Authors can only write revision files under specific conditions
578            if ($action === SubmissionFileAccessPolicy::SUBMISSION_FILE_ACCESS_READ || $hasEditorialAssignment) {
579                $allowedFileStages[] = SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION;
580                $allowedFileStages[] = SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_ATTACHMENT;
581            }
582            // Authors can never access review files
583            if ($hasEditorialAssignment) {
584                $allowedFileStages[] = SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_FILE;
585            }
586        }
587
588        if (
589            array_key_exists(WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_EDITING, $stageAssignments) &&
590            !empty(array_intersect($allowedRoles, $stageAssignments[WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_EDITING]))
591        ) {
592            $hasEditorialAssignment = !empty(array_intersect($notAuthorRoles, $stageAssignments[WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_EDITING]));
593            // Authors only have read access
594            if ($action === SubmissionFileAccessPolicy::SUBMISSION_FILE_ACCESS_READ || $hasEditorialAssignment) {
595                $allowedFileStages[] = SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT;
596            }
597            if ($hasEditorialAssignment) {
598                $allowedFileStages[] = SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_FINAL;
599            }
600        }
601
602        if (array_key_exists(WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_PRODUCTION, $stageAssignments) &&
603            !empty(array_intersect($allowedRoles, $stageAssignments[WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_PRODUCTION]))
604        ) {
605            $hasEditorialAssignment = !empty(array_intersect($notAuthorRoles, $stageAssignments[WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_PRODUCTION]));
606            // Authors only have read access
607            if ($action === SubmissionFileAccessPolicy::SUBMISSION_FILE_ACCESS_READ || $hasEditorialAssignment) {
608                $allowedFileStages[] = SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_PROOF;
609            }
610
611            if ($hasEditorialAssignment) {
612                $allowedFileStages[] = SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_PRODUCTION_READY;
613            }
614        }
615
616        return $allowedFileStages;
617    }
618
619    /**
620     * Get all valid file stages
621     *
622     * Valid file stages should be passed through
623     * the hook SubmissionFile::fileStages.
624     */
625    abstract public function getFileStages(): array;
626
627    /**
628     * Get the path to a submission's file directory
629     *
630     * This returns the relative path from the files_dir set in the config.
631     */
632    public function getSubmissionDir(
633        int $contextId,
634        int $submissionId
635    ): string {
636        $dirNames = Application::getFileDirectories();
637        return sprintf(
638            '%s/%d/%s/%d',
639            str_replace('/', '', $dirNames['context']),
640            $contextId,
641            str_replace('/', '', $dirNames['submission']),
642            $submissionId
643        );
644    }
645
646    /**
647     * Get the workflow stage for a submission file
648     */
649    public function getWorkflowStageId(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): ?int
650    {
651        $fileStage = $submissionFile->getData('fileStage');
652
653        if ($fileStage === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_SUBMISSION) {
654            return WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_SUBMISSION;
655        }
656
657        if (
658            $fileStage === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_FINAL ||
659            $fileStage === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT
660        ) {
661            return WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_EDITING;
662        }
663
664        if (
665            $fileStage === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_PROOF ||
666            $fileStage === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_PRODUCTION_READY ||
667            $fileStage === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_JATS
668        ) {
669            return WORKFLOW_STAGE_ID_PRODUCTION;
670        }
671
672        if (
673            $fileStage === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT
674        ) {
675            $parentFile = $this->get($submissionFile->getData('assocId'));
676
677            return $parentFile ? $this->getWorkflowStageId($parentFile) : null;
678        }
679
680        if (
681            $fileStage === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_FILE ||
682            $fileStage === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_INTERNAL_REVIEW_FILE ||
683            $fileStage === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_ATTACHMENT ||
684            $fileStage === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION ||
685            $fileStage === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_ATTACHMENT ||
686            $fileStage === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_INTERNAL_REVIEW_REVISION
687        ) {
688            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
689            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
690
691            return $reviewRound?->getStageId();
692        }
693
694        if ($fileStage === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_QUERY) {
695            // This file should be associated with a note. If not, fail.
696            if ($submissionFile->getData('assocType') != PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_NOTE) {
697                return null;
698            }
699
700            // Get the associated note.
701            $note = Note::find($submissionFile->getData('assocId'));
702
703            // The note should be associated with a query. If not, fail.
704            if ($note?->assocType != PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_QUERY) {
705                return null;
706            }
707
708            // Get the associated query.
709            $queryDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('QueryDAO'); /** @var QueryDAO $queryDao */
710            $query = $queryDao->getById($note->assocId);
711
712            // The query will have an associated file stage.
713            return $query?->getStageId();
714        }
715
716        throw new Exception('Could not determine the workflow stage id from submission file ' . $submissionFile->getId() . ' with file stage ' . $submissionFile->getData('fileStage'));
717    }
718
719    /**
720     * Check if a submission file supports dependent files
721     *
722     * @hook SubmissionFile::supportsDependentFiles [[&$result, $submissionFile]]
723     */
724    public function supportsDependentFiles(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): bool
725    {
726        $fileStage = $submissionFile->getData('fileStage');
727        $excludedFileStages = [
728            SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT,
729            SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_QUERY,
730        ];
731        $allowedMimetypes = [
732            'text/html',
733            'application/xml',
734            'text/xml',
735        ];
736
737        $result = !in_array($fileStage, $excludedFileStages) && in_array($submissionFile->getData('mimetype'), $allowedMimetypes);
738
739        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::supportsDependentFiles', [&$result, $submissionFile]);
740
741        return $result;
742    }
743
744    /**
745     * Get the files for each revision of a submission file
746     */
747    public function getRevisions(int $submissionFileId): Collection
748    {
749        return DB::table('submission_file_revisions as sfr')
750            ->leftJoin('files as f', 'f.file_id', '=', 'sfr.file_id')
751            ->where('submission_file_id', '=', $submissionFileId)
752            ->orderBy('revision_id', 'desc')
753            ->select(['f.file_id as fileId', 'f.path', 'f.mimetype', 'sfr.revision_id'])
754            ->get();
755    }
756
757    /**
758     * Sends email to notify editors about new revision of a submission file
759     */
760    protected function notifyEditorsRevisionsUploaded(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
761    {
762        $submission = Repo::submission()->get($submissionFile->getData('submissionId'));
763        $context = app()->get('context')->get($submission->getData('contextId'));
764        $uploader = Repo::user()->get($submissionFile->getData('uploaderUserId'));
765        $user = $this->request->getUser();
766
767        // Fetch the latest notification email timestamp
768        $submissionEmails = Repo::emailLogEntry()->getByEventType(
769            $submission->getId(),
770            SubmissionEmailLogEventType::AUTHOR_NOTIFY_REVISED_VERSION,
771            Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION
772        );
773        $lastNotification = null;
774        $sentDates = [];
775        if ($submissionEmails) {
776            foreach ($submissionEmails as $email) {
777                if ($email->dateSent) {
778                    $sentDates[] = $email->dateSent;
779                }
780            }
781            if (!empty($sentDates)) {
782                $lastNotification = max(array_map('strtotime', $sentDates));
783            }
784        }
785
786        // Get editors assigned to the submission, consider also the recommendOnly editors
787        $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
788        $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getById($submissionFile->getData('assocId'));
789
790        // Replaces StageAssignmentDAO::getEditorsAssignedToStage
791        $editorsStageAssignments = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submission->getId()])
792            ->withStageIds([$reviewRound->getStageId()])
793            ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_MANAGER, Role::ROLE_ID_SUB_EDITOR])
794            ->get();
795
796        $recipients = [];
797        foreach ($editorsStageAssignments as $editorsStageAssignment) {
798            $editor = Repo::user()->get($editorsStageAssignment->userId);
799            // IF no prior notification exists
800            // OR if editor has logged in after the last revision upload
801            // OR the last upload and notification was sent more than a day ago,
802            // THEN send a new notification
803            if (is_null($lastNotification) || strtotime($editor->getDateLastLogin()) > $lastNotification || strtotime('-1 day') > $lastNotification) {
804                $recipients[] = $editor;
805            }
806        }
807
808        if (empty($recipients)) {
809            return;
810        }
811
812        $mailable = new RevisedVersionNotify($context, $submission, $uploader, $reviewRound);
813        $template = Repo::emailTemplate()->getByKey($context->getId(), RevisedVersionNotify::getEmailTemplateKey());
814        $mailable->body($template->getLocalizedData('body'))
815            ->subject($template->getLocalizedData('subject'))
816            ->sender($user)
817            ->recipients($recipients)
818            ->replyTo($context->getData('contactEmail'), $context->getData('contactName'));
819
820        Mail::send($mailable);
821
822        Repo::emailLogEntry()->logMailable(
823            SubmissionEmailLogEventType::AUTHOR_NOTIFY_REVISED_VERSION,
824            $mailable,
825            $submission,
826            $user
827        );
828    }
829
830    /**
831     * Derive data from the submission file to record in the event log
832     */
833    protected function getSubmissionFileLogData(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): array
834    {
835        $user = $this->request->getUser();
836
837        return [
838            'userId' => Validation::loggedInAs() ?: $user?->getId(),
839            'fileStage' => $submissionFile->getData('fileStage'),
840            'submissionFileId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
841            'sourceSubmissionFileId' => $submissionFile->getData('sourceSubmissionFileId'),
842            'fileId' => $submissionFile->getData('fileId'),
843            'submissionId' => $submissionFile->getData('submissionId'),
844            'filename' => $submissionFile->getData('name'),
845            'username' => $user?->getUsername(),
846        ];
847    }
848
849    /**
850     * Can be used to copy a SubmissionFile to another SubmissionFile along with the corresponding file
851     */
852    public function versionSubmissionFile(
853        SubmissionFile $submissionFile,
854        Publication $newPublication
855    ): SubmissionFile {
856        $newSubmissionFile = clone $submissionFile;
857
858        $oldFileId = $submissionFile->getData('fileId');
859
860        $oldFile = app()->get('file')->get($oldFileId);
861
862        $submission = Repo::submission()->get($newPublication->getData('submissionId'));
863
864        $fileManager = new FileManager();
865        $extension = $fileManager->parseFileExtension($oldFile->path);
866
867        $submissionDir = Repo::submissionFile()
868            ->getSubmissionDir(
869                $submission->getData('contextId'),
870                $newPublication->getData('submissionId')
871            );
872
873        $newFileId = app()->get('file')->add(
874            Config::getVar('files', 'files_dir') . '/' . $oldFile->path,
875            $submissionDir . '/' . uniqid() . '.' . $extension
876        );
877
878        $newSubmissionFile->setData('id', null);
879        $newSubmissionFile->setData('assocId', $newPublication->getId());
880        $newSubmissionFile->setData('fileId', $newFileId);
881
882        $submissionFileId = Repo::submissionFile()
883            ->add($newSubmissionFile);
884
885        $submissionFile = Repo::submissionFile()
886            ->get($submissionFileId);
887
888        return $submissionFile;
889    }
890
891    /**
892     * Returns jatsContent for Submission files that correspond to the content of the file
893     *
894     * @throws \PKP\submissionFile\exceptions\UnableToCreateFileContentException If the default JATS creation fails
895     */
896    public function getSubmissionFileContent(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): string | false
897    {
898        $fileName = Config::getVar('files', 'files_dir') . '/' . $submissionFile->getData('path') . '';
899        $retValue = file_get_contents($fileName);
900
901        if ($retValue === false) {
902            throw new UnableToCreateFileContentException($fileName);
903        }
904
905        return $retValue;
906    }
907}

Paths

Below are the source code lines that represent each code path as identified by Xdebug. Please note a path is not necessarily coterminous with a line, a line may contain multiple paths and therefore show up more than once. Please also be aware that some paths may include implicit rather than explicit branches, e.g. an if statement always has an else as part of its logical flow even if you didn't write one.

PKP\submissionFile\
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });

62        $this->request = $request;
63    }

Repository->copy
396    public function copy(SubmissionFile $submissionFile, int $toFileStage, ?int $reviewRoundId = null): int
397    {
398        $newSubmissionFile = clone $submissionFile;
399        $newSubmissionFile->setData('fileStage', $toFileStage);
400        $newSubmissionFile->setData('sourceSubmissionFileId', $submissionFile->getId());
401        $newSubmissionFile->setData('assocType', null);
402        $newSubmissionFile->setData('assocId', null);
403
404        if ($reviewRoundId) {
 
405            $newSubmissionFile->setData('assocType', Application::ASSOC_TYPE_REVIEW_ROUND);
406            $newSubmissionFile->setData('assocId', $reviewRoundId);
407        }
408
409        return Repo::submissionFile()->add($newSubmissionFile);
 
409        return Repo::submissionFile()->add($newSubmissionFile);
410    }
396    public function copy(SubmissionFile $submissionFile, int $toFileStage, ?int $reviewRoundId = null): int
397    {
398        $newSubmissionFile = clone $submissionFile;
399        $newSubmissionFile->setData('fileStage', $toFileStage);

402        $newSubmissionFile->setData('assocId', null);
403
404        if ($reviewRoundId) {
 
409        return Repo::submissionFile()->add($newSubmissionFile);

Repository->delete
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
473            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }
476
477
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
494            $reviewRoundDao->updateStatus($reviewRound);
495        }
496
497        // Log the deletion
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
473            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }
476
477
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {

484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
473            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }
476
477
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
494            $reviewRoundDao->updateStatus($reviewRound);
495        }
496
497        // Log the deletion
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427

429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();

454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
465                break;
466        }

474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }

485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();

481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()

485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491

493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {

500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,

505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }

426            });

413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
494            $reviewRoundDao->updateStatus($reviewRound);
495        }
496
497        // Log the deletion
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }

415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416

418        $this

426            });

413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();

488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
494            $reviewRoundDao->updateStatus($reviewRound);
495        }
496
497        // Log the deletion
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
455                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
456                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
457                    [
458                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ASSIGN_COPYEDITOR,
459                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_AWAITING_COPYEDITS
460                    ],
461                    null,
462                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
463                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
464                );
465                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
473            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }
476
477
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
494            $reviewRoundDao->updateStatus($reviewRound);
495        }
496
497        // Log the deletion
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427

456                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
457                    [
458                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ASSIGN_COPYEDITOR,
459                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_AWAITING_COPYEDITS
460                    ],
461                    null,
462                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
463                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
464                );
465                break;
 
465                break;

474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }

413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416

418        $this
419            ->getCollector()

422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });

456                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
457                    [
458                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ASSIGN_COPYEDITOR,
459                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_AWAITING_COPYEDITS
460                    ],
461                    null,
462                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
463                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
464                );
465                break;
 
465                break;

474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }

486                ->getCount();

507            ]
508        ));

413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416

418        $this
419            ->getCollector()

422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()

425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });

460                    ],
