413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
455                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
456                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
457                    [
458                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ASSIGN_COPYEDITOR,
459                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_AWAITING_COPYEDITS
460                    ],
461                    null,
462                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
463                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
464                );
465                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
473            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }
476
477
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
494            $reviewRoundDao->updateStatus($reviewRound);
495        }
496
497        // Log the deletion
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
455                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
456                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
457                    [
458                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ASSIGN_COPYEDITOR,
459                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_AWAITING_COPYEDITS
460                    ],
461                    null,
462                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
463                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
464                );
465                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
473            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }
476
477
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file

456                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
457                    [

459                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_AWAITING_COPYEDITS
460                    ],

475        }

495        }

504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }

414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);

426            });

413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();

432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
455                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
456                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
457                    [
458                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ASSIGN_COPYEDITOR,
459                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_AWAITING_COPYEDITS
460                    ],
461                    null,
462                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
463                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
464                );
465                break;
 
465                break;
466        }

470

472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {

486                ->getCount();

488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();

488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }

499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
455                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
456                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
457                    [
458                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ASSIGN_COPYEDITOR,
459                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_AWAITING_COPYEDITS
460                    ],
461                    null,
462                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
463                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
464                );
465                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
494            $reviewRoundDao->updateStatus($reviewRound);
495        }
496
497        // Log the deletion
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();

432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {

454            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_COPYEDIT:
 
455                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
456                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
457                    [
458                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ASSIGN_COPYEDITOR,
459                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_AWAITING_COPYEDITS
460                    ],
461                    null,
462                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
463                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
464                );
465                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files

483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }

414    {

418        $this

426            });

505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);

511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);

413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
436                $authorUserIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submissionFile->getData('submissionId')])
437                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
438                    ->get()
439                    ->pluck('userId')
440                    ->all();
441
442                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],
448                    $authorUserIds,
449                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
450                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
451                );
452                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
473            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }
476
477
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
494            $reviewRoundDao->updateStatus($reviewRound);
495        }
496
497        // Log the deletion
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
436                $authorUserIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submissionFile->getData('submissionId')])
437                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
438                    ->get()
439                    ->pluck('userId')
440                    ->all();
441
442                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],
448                    $authorUserIds,
449                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
450                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
451                );
452                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
473            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }
476
477
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {

482            $countFileShares = $this

486                ->getCount();

481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {

484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491

500            [

506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
436                $authorUserIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submissionFile->getData('submissionId')])
437                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
438                    ->get()
439                    ->pluck('userId')
440                    ->all();
441
442                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],
448                    $authorUserIds,
449                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
450                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
451                );
452                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
473            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }
476
477
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491

493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
494            $reviewRoundDao->updateStatus($reviewRound);
495        }
496

498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
436                $authorUserIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submissionFile->getData('submissionId')])
437                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
438                    ->get()
439                    ->pluck('userId')
440                    ->all();
441
442                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],
448                    $authorUserIds,
449                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
450                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
451                );
452                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
473            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }
476
477
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430

432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
436                $authorUserIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submissionFile->getData('submissionId')])
437                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
438                    ->get()
439                    ->pluck('userId')
440                    ->all();
441
442                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],
448                    $authorUserIds,
449                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
450                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
451                );
452                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
473            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }
476
477
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
494            $reviewRoundDao->updateStatus($reviewRound);
495        }

498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
436                $authorUserIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submissionFile->getData('submissionId')])
437                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
438                    ->get()
439                    ->pluck('userId')
440                    ->all();
441
442                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],
448                    $authorUserIds,
449                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
450                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
451                );
452                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
473            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }
476
477
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
436                $authorUserIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submissionFile->getData('submissionId')])
437                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
438                    ->get()
439                    ->pluck('userId')
440                    ->all();
441
442                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],
448                    $authorUserIds,
449                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
450                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
451                );
452                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
473            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }
476
477
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
494            $reviewRoundDao->updateStatus($reviewRound);
495        }
496
497        // Log the deletion
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
436                $authorUserIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submissionFile->getData('submissionId')])
437                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
438                    ->get()
439                    ->pluck('userId')
440                    ->all();
441
442                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],
448                    $authorUserIds,
449                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
450                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
451                );
452                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
473            $reviewRoundDao = DAORegistry::getDAO('ReviewRoundDAO'); /** @var ReviewRoundDAO $reviewRoundDao */
474            $reviewRound = $reviewRoundDao->getBySubmissionFileId($submissionFile->getId());
475        }
476
477
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427

437                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
438                    ->get()

440                    ->all();

443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],
448                    $authorUserIds,

450                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
451                );

466        }

502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),

504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();

433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
436                $authorUserIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submissionFile->getData('submissionId')])
437                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
438                    ->get()
439                    ->pluck('userId')
440                    ->all();
441

443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],
448                    $authorUserIds,
449                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
450                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
451                );

465                break;
466        }

469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470

478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);

507            ]
508        ));

510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
436                $authorUserIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submissionFile->getData('submissionId')])
437                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
438                    ->get()
439                    ->pluck('userId')
440                    ->all();
441
442                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],
448                    $authorUserIds,
449                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
450                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
451                );
452                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
494            $reviewRoundDao->updateStatus($reviewRound);
495        }
496
497        // Log the deletion
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
436                $authorUserIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submissionFile->getData('submissionId')])
437                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
438                    ->get()
439                    ->pluck('userId')
440                    ->all();
441
442                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],
448                    $authorUserIds,
449                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
450                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
451                );
452                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430

432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {

436                $authorUserIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submissionFile->getData('submissionId')])
437                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
438                    ->get()
439                    ->pluck('userId')
440                    ->all();
441

443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],
448                    $authorUserIds,
449                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
450                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
451                );
452                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());

481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
494            $reviewRoundDao->updateStatus($reviewRound);
495        }
496
497        // Log the deletion
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427

438                    ->get()

440                    ->all();

443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],

451                );

507            ]

413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])

426            });

508        ));

413    public function delete(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): void
414    {
415        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete::before', [$submissionFile]);
416
417        // Delete dependent files
418        $this
419            ->getCollector()
420            ->includeDependentFiles(true)
421            ->filterByFileStages([SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT])
422            ->filterByAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, [$submissionFile->getId()])
423            ->getMany()
424            ->each(function (SubmissionFile $dependentFile) {
425                $this->delete($dependentFile);
426            });
427
428        // Delete notes for this submission file
429        Note::withAssoc(Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE, $submissionFile->getId())->delete();
430
431        // Update tasks
432        $notificationMgr = new NotificationManager();
433        switch ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage')) {
434            case SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION:
 
436                $authorUserIds = StageAssignment::withSubmissionIds([$submissionFile->getData('submissionId')])
437                    ->withRoleIds([Role::ROLE_ID_AUTHOR])
438                    ->get()
439                    ->pluck('userId')
440                    ->all();
441
442                $notificationMgr->updateNotification(
443                    Application::get()->getRequest(),
444                    [
445                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_INTERNAL_REVISIONS,
446                        Notification::NOTIFICATION_TYPE_PENDING_EXTERNAL_REVISIONS
447                    ],
448                    $authorUserIds,
449                    Application::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
450                    $submissionFile->getData('submissionId')
451                );
452                break;
 
465                break;
466        }
467
468        // Get all revision file ids before they are deleted
469        $revisions = $this->getRevisions($submissionFile->getId());
470
471        // Get the review round before review round files are deleted
472        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
478        $this->dao->delete($submissionFile);
479
480        // Delete all files that are not referenced by other submission files
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
 
481        foreach ($revisions as $revision) {
482            $countFileShares = $this
483                ->getCollector()
484                ->filterByFileIds([$revision->fileId])
485                ->includeDependentFiles(true)
486                ->getCount();
487            if (!$countFileShares) {
488                app()->get('file')->delete($revision->fileId);
489            }
490        }
491
492        // Update the review round status after deletion
493        if ($submissionFile->getData('fileStage') === SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION) {
 
498        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
499            $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile),
500            [
501                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
502                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
503                'eventType' => SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_DELETE,
504                'message' => 'submission.event.fileDeleted',
505                'isTranslated' => false,
506                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
507            ]
508        ));
509        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
510
511        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::delete', [$submissionFile]);
512    }
Repository->edit
340    public function edit(
341        SubmissionFile $submissionFile,
342        array $params
343    ): void {
344        $newSubmissionFile = clone $submissionFile;
345        $newSubmissionFile->setAllData(array_merge($newSubmissionFile->_data, $params));
346
347        Hook::call(
348            'SubmissionFile::edit',
349            [
350                $newSubmissionFile,
351                $submissionFile,
352                $params
353            ]
354        );
355
356        $newSubmissionFile->setData('updatedAt', Core::getCurrentDate());
357
358        $this->dao->update($newSubmissionFile);
359
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');
 
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');
 
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');
361
362        $logData = $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile);
363        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
364            $logData,
365            [
366                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
367                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
368                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
 
368                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
 
368                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
369                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
 
369                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
 
369                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
370                'isTranslated' => false,
371                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
372            ]
373        ));
374        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
375
376        $submission = Repo::submission()->get($submissionFile->getData('submissionId'));
377
378        Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
379            $logData,
380            [
381                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
382                'assocId' => $submission->getId(),

340    public function edit(
341        SubmissionFile $submissionFile,
342        array $params
343    ): void {
344        $newSubmissionFile = clone $submissionFile;
345        $newSubmissionFile->setAllData(array_merge($newSubmissionFile->_data, $params));
346
347        Hook::call(
348            'SubmissionFile::edit',
349            [
350                $newSubmissionFile,
351                $submissionFile,
352                $params
353            ]
354        );
355
356        $newSubmissionFile->setData('updatedAt', Core::getCurrentDate());
357
358        $this->dao->update($newSubmissionFile);
359
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');
 
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');
 
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');

342        array $params
343    ): void {

345        $newSubmissionFile->setAllData(array_merge($newSubmissionFile->_data, $params));

351                $submissionFile,

353            ]
354        );

359

360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');

381                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
382                'assocId' => $submission->getId(),
383                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
 
383                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
 
383                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
384                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
 
384                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
 
384                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
385                'isTranslate' => false,
386                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
387            ]
388        ));
389    }
340    public function edit(
341        SubmissionFile $submissionFile,
342        array $params
343    ): void {
344        $newSubmissionFile = clone $submissionFile;
345        $newSubmissionFile->setAllData(array_merge($newSubmissionFile->_data, $params));
346
347        Hook::call(
348            'SubmissionFile::edit',
349            [
350                $newSubmissionFile,
351                $submissionFile,
352                $params
353            ]
354        );
355
356        $newSubmissionFile->setData('updatedAt', Core::getCurrentDate());
357
358        $this->dao->update($newSubmissionFile);
359
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');
 
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');
 
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');

372            ]
373        ));

368                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
