368                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
369                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
 
369                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
 
369                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
370                'isTranslated' => false,
371                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
372            ]
373        ));
374        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
375
376        $submission = Repo::submission()->get($submissionFile->getData('submissionId'));
377
378        Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
379            $logData,
380            [
381                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
382                'assocId' => $submission->getId(),
383                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
 
383                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
 
383                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
384                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
 
384                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
 
384                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
385                'isTranslate' => false,
386                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
387            ]
388        ));
389    }
340    public function edit(
341        SubmissionFile $submissionFile,
342        array $params
343    ): void {
344        $newSubmissionFile = clone $submissionFile;
345        $newSubmissionFile->setAllData(array_merge($newSubmissionFile->_data, $params));
346
347        Hook::call(
348            'SubmissionFile::edit',
349            [
350                $newSubmissionFile,
351                $submissionFile,
352                $params
353            ]
354        );
355
356        $newSubmissionFile->setData('updatedAt', Core::getCurrentDate());
357
358        $this->dao->update($newSubmissionFile);
359
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');
 
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');

364            $logData,

372            ]

340    public function edit(
341        SubmissionFile $submissionFile,
342        array $params
343    ): void {
344        $newSubmissionFile = clone $submissionFile;
345        $newSubmissionFile->setAllData(array_merge($newSubmissionFile->_data, $params));
346
347        Hook::call(
348            'SubmissionFile::edit',
349            [
350                $newSubmissionFile,
351                $submissionFile,
352                $params
353            ]
354        );
355
356        $newSubmissionFile->setData('updatedAt', Core::getCurrentDate());
357
358        $this->dao->update($newSubmissionFile);
359
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');
 
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');
361
362        $logData = $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile);
363        $logEntry = Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
364            $logData,
365            [
366                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
367                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
368                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
 
368                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
 
368                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
369                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
 
369                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
 
369                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
370                'isTranslated' => false,
371                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
372            ]
373        ));
374        Repo::eventLog()->add($logEntry);
375
376        $submission = Repo::submission()->get($submissionFile->getData('submissionId'));
377
378        Repo::eventLog()->newDataObject(array_merge(
379            $logData,
380            [
381                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION,
382                'assocId' => $submission->getId(),
383                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
 
383                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
 
383                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
384                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
 
384                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
 
384                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
385                'isTranslate' => false,
386                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
387            ]
388        ));

343    ): void {

351                $submissionFile,
352                $params
353            ]
354        );
355
356        $newSubmissionFile->setData('updatedAt', Core::getCurrentDate());
357
358        $this->dao->update($newSubmissionFile);
359
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');
 
360        $newFileUploaded = !empty($params['fileId']) && $params['fileId'] !== $submissionFile->getData('fileId');
361
362        $logData = $this->getSubmissionFileLogData($submissionFile);

364            $logData,
365            [
366                'assocType' => PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE,
367                'assocId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
368                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
 
368                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
 
368                'eventType' => $newFileUploaded ? SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_REVISION_UPLOAD : SubmissionFileEventLogEntry::SUBMISSION_LOG_FILE_EDIT,
369                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
 
369                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
 
369                'message' => $newFileUploaded ? 'submission.event.revisionUploaded' : 'submission.event.fileEdited',
370                'isTranslated' => false,
371                'dateLogged' => Core::getCurrentDate(),
372            ]
373        ));

349            [
350                $newSubmissionFile,
351                $submissionFile,
352                $params
353            ]

Repository->getRevisions
747    public function getRevisions(int $submissionFileId): Collection
748    {
749        return DB::table('submission_file_revisions as sfr')
750            ->leftJoin('files as f', 'f.file_id', '=', 'sfr.file_id')
751            ->where('submission_file_id', '=', $submissionFileId)
752            ->orderBy('revision_id', 'desc')
753            ->select(['f.file_id as fileId', 'f.path', 'f.mimetype', 'sfr.revision_id'])
754            ->get();
755    }
Repository->getSchemaMap
100        return app('maps')->withExtensions($this->schemaMap);
101    }
Repository->getSubmissionDir
632    public function getSubmissionDir(
633        int $contextId,
634        int $submissionId
635    ): string {
636        $dirNames = Application::getFileDirectories();
637        return sprintf(
638            '%s/%d/%s/%d',
639            str_replace('/', '', $dirNames['context']),
640            $contextId,
641            str_replace('/', '', $dirNames['submission']),
642            $submissionId
643        );
644    }
Repository->getSubmissionFileContent
896    public function getSubmissionFileContent(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): string | false
897    {
898        $fileName = Config::getVar('files', 'files_dir') . '/' . $submissionFile->getData('path') . '';
899        $retValue = file_get_contents($fileName);
900
901        if ($retValue === false) {
 
902            throw new UnableToCreateFileContentException($fileName);
896    public function getSubmissionFileContent(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): string | false
897    {
898        $fileName = Config::getVar('files', 'files_dir') . '/' . $submissionFile->getData('path') . '';
899        $retValue = file_get_contents($fileName);
900
901        if ($retValue === false) {
 
905        return $retValue;
906    }
Repository->getSubmissionFileLogData
833    protected function getSubmissionFileLogData(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): array
834    {
835        $user = $this->request->getUser();
836
837        return [
838            'userId' => Validation::loggedInAs() ?: $user?->getId(),
839            'fileStage' => $submissionFile->getData('fileStage'),
840            'submissionFileId' => $submissionFile->getId(),
841            'sourceSubmissionFileId' => $submissionFile->getData('sourceSubmissionFileId'),
842            'fileId' => $submissionFile->getData('fileId'),
843            'submissionId' => $submissionFile->getData('submissionId'),
844            'filename' => $submissionFile->getData('name'),
845            'username' => $user?->getUsername(),
846        ];
847    }

Repository->supportsDependentFiles
724    public function supportsDependentFiles(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): bool
725    {
726        $fileStage = $submissionFile->getData('fileStage');
727        $excludedFileStages = [
728            SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT,
729            SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_QUERY,
730        ];
731        $allowedMimetypes = [
732            'text/html',
733            'application/xml',
734            'text/xml',
735        ];
736
737        $result = !in_array($fileStage, $excludedFileStages) && in_array($submissionFile->getData('mimetype'), $allowedMimetypes);
 
737        $result = !in_array($fileStage, $excludedFileStages) && in_array($submissionFile->getData('mimetype'), $allowedMimetypes);
 
737        $result = !in_array($fileStage, $excludedFileStages) && in_array($submissionFile->getData('mimetype'), $allowedMimetypes);
738
739        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::supportsDependentFiles', [&$result, $submissionFile]);
740
741        return $result;
742    }
724    public function supportsDependentFiles(SubmissionFile $submissionFile): bool
725    {
726        $fileStage = $submissionFile->getData('fileStage');
727        $excludedFileStages = [
728            SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT,
729            SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_QUERY,
730        ];
731        $allowedMimetypes = [
732            'text/html',
733            'application/xml',
734            'text/xml',
735        ];
736
737        $result = !in_array($fileStage, $excludedFileStages) && in_array($submissionFile->getData('mimetype'), $allowedMimetypes);
 
737        $result = !in_array($fileStage, $excludedFileStages) && in_array($submissionFile->getData('mimetype'), $allowedMimetypes);
738
739        Hook::call('SubmissionFile::supportsDependentFiles', [&$result, $submissionFile]);
740
741        return $result;
742    }
Repository->validate
116    public function validate(
117        ?SubmissionFile $object,
118        array $props,
119        array $allowedLocales,
120        string $submissionLocale
121    ): array {
122        $validator = ValidatorFactory::make(
123            $props,
124            $this->schemaService->getValidationRules($this->dao->schema, $allowedLocales),
125            []
126        );
127
128        // Check required fields
129        ValidatorFactory::required(
130            $validator,
131            $object,
132            $this->schemaService->getRequiredProps($this->dao->schema),
133            $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema),
134            $allowedLocales,
135            $submissionLocale
136        );
137
138        // Check for input from disallowed locales
139        ValidatorFactory::allowedLocales($validator, $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema), $allowedLocales);
140
141        // Do not allow the uploaderUserId or createdAt properties to be modified
142        if ($object) {
 
143            $validator->after(function ($validator) use ($props) {
144                if (
145                    !empty($props['uploaderUserId']) &&
146                    !$validator->errors()->get('uploaderUserId')
147                ) {
148                    $validator
149                        ->errors()
150                        ->add(
151                            'uploaderUserId',
152                            __('submission.file.notAllowedUploaderUserId')
153                        );
154                }
155
156                if (
157                    !empty($props['createdAt']) &&
158                    !$validator->errors()->get('createdAt')
159                ) {
160                    $validator
161                        ->errors()
162                        ->add(
163                            'createdAt',
164                            __('api.files.400.notAllowedCreatedAt')
165                        );
166                }
167            });
168        }
169
170        // Make sure that file stage and assocType match
171        if (isset($props['assocType'])) {
 
171        if (isset($props['assocType'])) {
 
172            $validator->after(function ($validator) use ($props) {
173                if (
174                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_REVIEW_ROUND &&
175                    !in_array(
176                        $props['fileStage'],
177                        [SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_FILE, SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION, SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_INTERNAL_REVIEW_FILE, SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_INTERNAL_REVIEW_REVISION]
178                    )
179                ) {
180                    $validator
181                        ->errors()
182                        ->add(
183                            'assocType',
184                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badReviewRoundAssocType')
185                        );
186                }
187
188                if ($props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_REVIEW_ASSIGNMENT && $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_ATTACHMENT) {
189                    $validator
190                        ->errors()
191                        ->add(
192                            'assocType',
193                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badReviewAssignmentAssocType')
194                        );
195                }
196
197                if (
198                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE &&
199                    $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT
200                ) {
201                    $validator
202                        ->errors()
203                        ->add(
204                            'assocType',
205                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badDependentFileAssocType')
206                        );
207                }
208
209                if (
210                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_NOTE &&
211                    $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_NOTE
212                ) {
213                    $validator
214                        ->errors()
215                        ->add(
216                            'assocType',
217                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badNoteAssocType')
218                        );
219                }
220
221                if (
222                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_REPRESENTATION &&
223                    $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_PROOF
224                ) {
225                    $validator
226                        ->errors()
227                        ->add(
228                            'assocType',
229                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badRepresentationAssocType')
230                        );
231                }
232            });
233        }
234
235        $errors = [];
 
235        $errors = [];
236
237        if ($validator->fails()) {
 
238            $errors = $this->schemaService->formatValidationErrors($validator->errors());
239        }
240
241        Hook::call(
 
241        Hook::call(
242            'SubmissionFile::validate',
243            [
244                &$errors,
245                $object,
246                $props,
247                $allowedLocales,
248                $submissionLocale
249            ]
250        );
251
252        return $errors;
253    }
116    public function validate(
117        ?SubmissionFile $object,
118        array $props,
119        array $allowedLocales,
120        string $submissionLocale
121    ): array {
122        $validator = ValidatorFactory::make(
123            $props,
124            $this->schemaService->getValidationRules($this->dao->schema, $allowedLocales),
125            []
126        );
127
128        // Check required fields
129        ValidatorFactory::required(
130            $validator,
131            $object,
132            $this->schemaService->getRequiredProps($this->dao->schema),
133            $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema),
134            $allowedLocales,
135            $submissionLocale
136        );
137
138        // Check for input from disallowed locales
139        ValidatorFactory::allowedLocales($validator, $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema), $allowedLocales);
140
141        // Do not allow the uploaderUserId or createdAt properties to be modified
142        if ($object) {
 
143            $validator->after(function ($validator) use ($props) {
144                if (
145                    !empty($props['uploaderUserId']) &&
146                    !$validator->errors()->get('uploaderUserId')
147                ) {
148                    $validator
149                        ->errors()
150                        ->add(
151                            'uploaderUserId',
152                            __('submission.file.notAllowedUploaderUserId')
153                        );
154                }
155
156                if (
157                    !empty($props['createdAt']) &&
158                    !$validator->errors()->get('createdAt')
159                ) {
160                    $validator
161                        ->errors()
162                        ->add(
163                            'createdAt',
164                            __('api.files.400.notAllowedCreatedAt')
165                        );
166                }
167            });
168        }
169
170        // Make sure that file stage and assocType match
171        if (isset($props['assocType'])) {
 
171        if (isset($props['assocType'])) {
 
172            $validator->after(function ($validator) use ($props) {
173                if (
174                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_REVIEW_ROUND &&
175                    !in_array(
176                        $props['fileStage'],
177                        [SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_FILE, SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION, SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_INTERNAL_REVIEW_FILE, SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_INTERNAL_REVIEW_REVISION]
178                    )
179                ) {
180                    $validator
181                        ->errors()
182                        ->add(
183                            'assocType',
184                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badReviewRoundAssocType')
185                        );
186                }
187
188                if ($props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_REVIEW_ASSIGNMENT && $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_ATTACHMENT) {
189                    $validator
190                        ->errors()
191                        ->add(
192                            'assocType',
193                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badReviewAssignmentAssocType')
194                        );
195                }
196
197                if (
198                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE &&
199                    $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT
200                ) {
201                    $validator
202                        ->errors()
203                        ->add(
204                            'assocType',
205                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badDependentFileAssocType')
206                        );
207                }
208
209                if (
210                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_NOTE &&
211                    $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_NOTE
212                ) {
213                    $validator
214                        ->errors()
215                        ->add(
216                            'assocType',
217                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badNoteAssocType')
218                        );
219                }
220
221                if (
222                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_REPRESENTATION &&
223                    $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_PROOF
224                ) {
225                    $validator
226                        ->errors()
227                        ->add(
228                            'assocType',
229                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badRepresentationAssocType')
230                        );
231                }
232            });
233        }
234
235        $errors = [];
 
235        $errors = [];
236
237        if ($validator->fails()) {
 
241        Hook::call(
242            'SubmissionFile::validate',
243            [
244                &$errors,
245                $object,
246                $props,
247                $allowedLocales,
248                $submissionLocale
249            ]
250        );
251
252        return $errors;
253    }
116    public function validate(
117        ?SubmissionFile $object,
118        array $props,
119        array $allowedLocales,
120        string $submissionLocale
121    ): array {
122        $validator = ValidatorFactory::make(
123            $props,
124            $this->schemaService->getValidationRules($this->dao->schema, $allowedLocales),
125            []
126        );
127
128        // Check required fields
129        ValidatorFactory::required(
130            $validator,
131            $object,
132            $this->schemaService->getRequiredProps($this->dao->schema),
133            $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema),
134            $allowedLocales,
135            $submissionLocale
136        );
137
138        // Check for input from disallowed locales
139        ValidatorFactory::allowedLocales($validator, $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema), $allowedLocales);
140
141        // Do not allow the uploaderUserId or createdAt properties to be modified
142        if ($object) {
 
143            $validator->after(function ($validator) use ($props) {
144                if (
145                    !empty($props['uploaderUserId']) &&
146                    !$validator->errors()->get('uploaderUserId')
147                ) {
148                    $validator
149                        ->errors()
150                        ->add(
151                            'uploaderUserId',
152                            __('submission.file.notAllowedUploaderUserId')
153                        );
154                }
155

158                    !$validator->errors()->get('createdAt')
159                ) {
160                    $validator
161                        ->errors()
162                        ->add(
163                            'createdAt',
164                            __('api.files.400.notAllowedCreatedAt')
165                        );
166                }
167            });
168        }
169

171        if (isset($props['assocType'])) {
 
171        if (isset($props['assocType'])) {
 
235        $errors = [];
236
237        if ($validator->fails()) {
 
238            $errors = $this->schemaService->formatValidationErrors($validator->errors());
239        }
240
241        Hook::call(
 
241        Hook::call(
242            'SubmissionFile::validate',
243            [
244                &$errors,
245                $object,
246                $props,
247                $allowedLocales,
248                $submissionLocale
249            ]
250        );
251
252        return $errors;

116    public function validate(
117        ?SubmissionFile $object,
118        array $props,
119        array $allowedLocales,
120        string $submissionLocale
121    ): array {
122        $validator = ValidatorFactory::make(
123            $props,
124            $this->schemaService->getValidationRules($this->dao->schema, $allowedLocales),
125            []
126        );
127
128        // Check required fields
129        ValidatorFactory::required(
130            $validator,
131            $object,
132            $this->schemaService->getRequiredProps($this->dao->schema),
133            $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema),
134            $allowedLocales,
135            $submissionLocale
136        );
137
138        // Check for input from disallowed locales
139        ValidatorFactory::allowedLocales($validator, $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema), $allowedLocales);
140
141        // Do not allow the uploaderUserId or createdAt properties to be modified
142        if ($object) {
 
171        if (isset($props['assocType'])) {
 
172            $validator->after(function ($validator) use ($props) {
173                if (
174                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_REVIEW_ROUND &&
175                    !in_array(
176                        $props['fileStage'],
177                        [SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_FILE, SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION, SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_INTERNAL_REVIEW_FILE, SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_INTERNAL_REVIEW_REVISION]
178                    )
179                ) {
180                    $validator
181                        ->errors()
182                        ->add(
183                            'assocType',
184                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badReviewRoundAssocType')
185                        );
186                }
187
188                if ($props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_REVIEW_ASSIGNMENT && $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_ATTACHMENT) {
189                    $validator
190                        ->errors()
191                        ->add(
192                            'assocType',
193                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badReviewAssignmentAssocType')
194                        );
195                }
196
197                if (
198                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE &&
199                    $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT
200                ) {
201                    $validator
202                        ->errors()
203                        ->add(
204                            'assocType',
205                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badDependentFileAssocType')
206                        );
207                }
208
209                if (
210                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_NOTE &&
211                    $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_NOTE
212                ) {
213                    $validator
214                        ->errors()
215                        ->add(
216                            'assocType',
217                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badNoteAssocType')
218                        );
219                }
220
221                if (
222                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_REPRESENTATION &&
223                    $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_PROOF
224                ) {
225                    $validator
226                        ->errors()
227                        ->add(
228                            'assocType',
229                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badRepresentationAssocType')
230                        );
231                }
232            });
233        }
234
235        $errors = [];
 
235        $errors = [];
236
237        if ($validator->fails()) {
 
238            $errors = $this->schemaService->formatValidationErrors($validator->errors());
239        }
240
241        Hook::call(
 
241        Hook::call(
242            'SubmissionFile::validate',
243            [
244                &$errors,
245                $object,
246                $props,
247                $allowedLocales,
248                $submissionLocale
249            ]
250        );
251
252        return $errors;
253    }
116    public function validate(
117        ?SubmissionFile $object,
118        array $props,
119        array $allowedLocales,
120        string $submissionLocale
121    ): array {
122        $validator = ValidatorFactory::make(
123            $props,
124            $this->schemaService->getValidationRules($this->dao->schema, $allowedLocales),
125            []
126        );
127
128        // Check required fields
129        ValidatorFactory::required(
130            $validator,
131            $object,
132            $this->schemaService->getRequiredProps($this->dao->schema),
133            $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema),
134            $allowedLocales,
135            $submissionLocale
136        );
137
138        // Check for input from disallowed locales
139        ValidatorFactory::allowedLocales($validator, $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema), $allowedLocales);
140
141        // Do not allow the uploaderUserId or createdAt properties to be modified
142        if ($object) {
 
171        if (isset($props['assocType'])) {
 
172            $validator->after(function ($validator) use ($props) {
173                if (
174                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_REVIEW_ROUND &&
175                    !in_array(
176                        $props['fileStage'],
177                        [SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_FILE, SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_REVISION, SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_INTERNAL_REVIEW_FILE, SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_INTERNAL_REVIEW_REVISION]
178                    )
179                ) {
180                    $validator
181                        ->errors()
182                        ->add(
183                            'assocType',
184                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badReviewRoundAssocType')
185                        );
186                }
187
188                if ($props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_REVIEW_ASSIGNMENT && $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_REVIEW_ATTACHMENT) {
189                    $validator
190                        ->errors()
191                        ->add(
192                            'assocType',
193                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badReviewAssignmentAssocType')
194                        );
195                }
196
197                if (
198                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_SUBMISSION_FILE &&
199                    $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_DEPENDENT
200                ) {
201                    $validator
202                        ->errors()
203                        ->add(
204                            'assocType',
205                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badDependentFileAssocType')
206                        );
207                }
208
209                if (
210                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_NOTE &&
211                    $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_NOTE
212                ) {
213                    $validator
214                        ->errors()
215                        ->add(
216                            'assocType',
217                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badNoteAssocType')
218                        );
219                }
220
221                if (
222                    $props['assocType'] === PKPApplication::ASSOC_TYPE_REPRESENTATION &&
223                    $props['fileStage'] !== SubmissionFile::SUBMISSION_FILE_PROOF
224                ) {
225                    $validator
226                        ->errors()
227                        ->add(
228                            'assocType',
229                            __('api.submissionFiles.400.badRepresentationAssocType')
230                        );
231                }
232            });
233        }
234
235        $errors = [];
 
235        $errors = [];
236
237        if ($validator->fails()) {
 
241        Hook::call(
242            'SubmissionFile::validate',
243            [
244                &$errors,
245                $object,
246                $props,
247                $allowedLocales,
248                $submissionLocale
249            ]
250        );
251
252        return $errors;

116    public function validate(
117        ?SubmissionFile $object,
118        array $props,
119        array $allowedLocales,
120        string $submissionLocale
121    ): array {
122        $validator = ValidatorFactory::make(
123            $props,
124            $this->schemaService->getValidationRules($this->dao->schema, $allowedLocales),
125            []
126        );

130            $validator,
131            $object,
132            $this->schemaService->getRequiredProps($this->dao->schema),
133            $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema),
134            $allowedLocales,
135            $submissionLocale
136        );
137
138        // Check for input from disallowed locales
139        ValidatorFactory::allowedLocales($validator, $this->schemaService->getMultilingualProps($this->dao->schema), $allowedLocales);

171        if (isset($props['assocType'])) {
 
235        $errors = [];

241        Hook::call(
242            'SubmissionFile::validate',
243            [
244                &$errors,
245                $object,
246                $props,
247                $allowedLocales,
248                $submissionLocale
249            ]
250        );
251
252        return $errors;
253    }
Repository->versionSubmissionFile
852    public function versionSubmissionFile(
853        SubmissionFile $submissionFile,
854        Publication $newPublication
855    ): SubmissionFile {
856        $newSubmissionFile = clone $submissionFile;
857
858        $oldFileId = $submissionFile->getData('fileId');
859
860        $oldFile = app()->get('file')->get($oldFileId);
861
862        $submission = Repo::submission()->get($newPublication->getData('submissionId'));
863
864        $fileManager = new FileManager();
865        $extension = $fileManager->parseFileExtension($oldFile->path);
866
867        $submissionDir = Repo::submissionFile()
868            ->getSubmissionDir(
869                $submission->getData('contextId'),
870                $newPublication->getData('submissionId')
871            );
872
873        $newFileId = app()->get('file')->add(
874            Config::getVar('files', 'files_dir') . '/' . $oldFile->path,
875            $submissionDir . '/' . uniqid() . '.' . $extension
876        );
877
878        $newSubmissionFile->setData('id', null);
879        $newSubmissionFile->setData('assocId', $newPublication->getId());
880        $newSubmissionFile->setData('fileId', $newFileId);
881
882        $submissionFileId = Repo::submissionFile()
883            ->add($newSubmissionFile);
884
885        $submissionFile = Repo::submissionFile()
886            ->get($submissionFileId);
887
888        return $submissionFile;
889    }

Legend

Fully coveredPartially coveredNot covered
